This is the right section. And FIFTH don’t post if you don’t have no common sense, as this is the right section. He’s trying to get his Green D’ Legs to appear ingame, it’s client sided until you have to add the item ID and the other stuff into the item.cfg .[/quote]
are you mentaly retarded?

this is for his CLIENT. it goes in class 8 in his CLIENT so why would it be in SERVER help?

and the double post, he did the same thing in client help, where i didn’t post, cos’ i don’t know how to. but i don’t want to see himg get banned or something, so we tell him this so it doesn’t happen again.
